name: Surviving Cuteness
description:
This game is a very nice learning process that i had, its an easy arcade game that i built using free assets from the asset store that demonstrate lots of things i was learning lately with unity, c# scripting, Fmod integration and some other tools that i acquired.

the game is simple, you just need to run, jump, avoid the explosives and gather all the amulets to finish the stage.

This was a learning process and for me as a sound designer its a big achievement, hope you all enjoy.
